title: Strategies for Developing Motivation in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics concepts (first-year university level) and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Mixed learner group including job seekers and enrolled students, with mandatory digital devices (laptop/tablet)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the difference between intrinsic and extrinsic motivation in online math learning environments.
Learners can visualize and analyze motivation change patterns over six-week intervals through graphing.
Learners can design and implement three personalized strategies to maintain motivation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
